titleStmt.title: King Iames his welcome to London With Elizaes tombe and epitaph, and our Kings triumph and epitimie. Lamenting the ones decease, and reioycing at the others accesse. Written by I.F.
titleStmt.author: I. F.
Fenton, John, fl. 1603, attributed name.
Ferrers, John, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to John Fenton and to John Ferrers.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
